game - package game
 
GameController - Class in controller
New class that allows us to set the animation of the models.

gameOver() - Static method in class controller.MenuController
Used to determine the set of actions to be taken as the player loses the game
GameView - Class in view
New class that extends Pane and uses constructor to set the game views.

gameWon() - Static method in class controller.MenuController
Used to determine the set of actions to be taken when the player wins the game
